title: What to Read This Week
sub_head: Five books that illuminate the experience of D-Day, new fiction from Rivka Galchen, myth versus history at the Alamo, the Roman art of political humor and more.
body:
Myths about the Texas Revolution obscure a less exalted reality. Review by Andrew R. Graybill
Read the review
In Rivka Galchen’s novel, an astronomer’s daughter is accused of sorcery. Review by Wyatt Mason.
Read the review
